alert.note: Alert for Bates; Cass; Henry; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:23AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cass, northwestern Henry, northeastern Bates and Johnson Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 123 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Creighton, or 7 miles southeast of Garden City, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Holden, Garden City, Leeton, Urich, Creighton, Chilhowee, Centerview, Gunn City, Blairstown, La Tour, Post Oak, Hartwell and Quick City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Missouri. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central and west central Missouri.
